title: Which Music Is your favourite?
body:
To all of you fellow players, who's character music, is your favourite?

Most Of My friebnds think jinx has the best, or maybe Vi.

But My favourite is Braums. It just makes me feel full, and hopefull and other cheesey crap. But I absolutely love it, its a wonderful piece of art.

replies.body: Not saying Diana's means your music taste is godawful and you should just cut off your ears.

I'm not going to count log in screens that I wasn't there for. (In no particular order)
Braum's music is nice but got really annoying very quickly, most annoying log in music for me so far, had to mute log in music for the whole time he was there. 
Lucian's was always cool, one of the best was never annoying, found myself stopping just to listen.
Initially I had to get used to Jinx's, but after a few days I got used to it.
Aatrox was pretty good initially. Alright for the rest of the time. Didn't really stop to listen.
Yasuo's is damn awesome. So calming, found myself stopping to log in just to listen.
Super Galaxy Rumble is just pure epicness, found myself listening to it multiple times.
Lissandra's was epic all the way.
Pool Party log in is the shit.
Vel'Koz's log in should have been that moment where he stares down at Helmet Bro in his teaser video.
where do u find the Champions music?
Get Jinxed is my favourite Champion theme, followed by Thresh's song.

{{champion:34}}  This is biased though. Anivia is my favourite champion! 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1PyoIQ_AWAo
OMFG DID NOT KNOW THIS EXISTED. SO FUCKING SWEET! XDDD
